patthana12.7:1.1_0: Nasahetukaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasahetuko nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana12.7:1.1_1: Nasahetukaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naahetuko nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana12.7:1.1_2: Nasahetukaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasahetuko nahetu ca naahetuko nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana12.7:2.1_0: Naahetukaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naahetuko nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana12.7:2.1_1: Naahetukaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasahetuko nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana12.7:2.1_2: Naahetukaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasahetuko nahetu ca naahetuko nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana12.7:3.1_0: Nasahetukaṁ nahetuñca naahetukaṁ nahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasahetuko nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana12.7:3.1_1: Nasahetukaṁ nahetuñca naahetukaṁ nahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca naahetuko nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana12.7:3.1_2: Nasahetukaṁ nahetuñca naahetukaṁ nahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasahetuko nahetu ca naahetuko nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana12.7:4.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca …pe…
patthana12.7:5.1_0: Naahetukaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naahetuko nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana12.7:7.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca …pe…
patthana12.7:9.1_1: naahetukañceva nana ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…
patthana12.7:9.1_3: nahetuvippayuttañceva nana ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
patthana12.7:11.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca …pe…
